metadata.Title: CVE-2014-5260 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The (1) mkxmltype and (2) mkdtskel scripts in XML-DT before 0.64 allowlocal users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on a/tmp/_xml_##### temporary file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5260` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml-dt-perl - 0.66-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libxml-dt-perl package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.66-1').
